text.ops: Highlight the research and development expenditure for the year 2006, showing 5009.7.
text.ops2: Next, highlight the research and development expenditure for the year 2008, showing 7128.11.
text.last: Finally, calculate the difference between the highlighted 2008 value and the 2006 value, which is 7128.11 minus 5009.7, resulting in 2118.41.
